Text: RetainageBelow is what I have sent to everyone else Jeff Gilliam Forwarded by Jeff GilliamCorpEnron on AM Jeff Gilliam PM To Greg NRON Karry CT cc Jessica A nron Ken nron Subject Retainage Revised estimate for the retainage is approximately Also I have included a copy of what I sent to Greg Schlender earlier for Karry The retainage amount above is included in the accrual for services number shown below Project to Date Costs Work Order Authorized Projected Accrual for services Work order June Amount Inservice date materials not yet invoiced S UnderConstruction S UnderConstruction S UnderConstruction S UnderConstruction S UnderConstruction S S S Note there are four Receipt points under this work order two are inservice Dead Horse on and Hawk Point on There was four compressor stations constructed under this work order all are inservice today Hannum on followed by Mustang Haracz and Palomino on May Jeff Gilliam Forwarded by Jeff GilliamCorpEnron on PM Jeff Gilliam PM To Greg NRON cc Subject Retainage Greg The estimated liability for retainage is approximately I hope this helps Jeff Gilliam
